title: Man Seeks Wife
description: The Man Seeks Woman saga continues in this the second helping of the Man Seeks Woman series between Victoria and Sebastian. Will he ever be able to make it up to her? Will she ever be able to forgive him? Will Victoria ever be able to shake off her past? Will Sebastian ever be able to shake off Naomi? Get ready for the highs and lows, in's and out's and steamy sexy scenes...enjoy!
author: S.M. Franklin
